subprocess_flow.description: The HR Specialist compiles all necessary onboarding documents, including employment contracts, benefits enrollment forms, and company policy manuals. GenAI assists in personalizing these documents with the new hire's information, ensuring accuracy and completeness. This step ensures that all required paperwork is ready for the new employee.
success_criteria: All onboarding documents are personalized and accurate
Onboarding package is complete and ready for distribution

subprocess_flow.description: GenAI automates the generation of standard onboarding paperwork, such as tax forms (W-4, I-9) and direct deposit authorization forms. The system pre-fills these forms with available employee data, reducing manual input and potential errors. This automation streamlines the paperwork process and improves efficiency.
success_criteria: Tax forms and direct deposit forms are automatically generated
Reduced manual input and errors in paperwork

subprocess_flow.description: GenAI curates and delivers initial training materials tailored to the new hire's role and department. These materials may include introductory videos, training modules, and access to the company's learning management system (LMS). This step ensures that new hires have the resources they need to start learning about their roles and the company.
success_criteria: New hires receive tailored training materials
Training materials are relevant and up-to-date

subprocess_flow.description: GenAI provides a chatbot or virtual assistant to answer frequently asked questions from new hires. This system can address common queries about benefits, company policies, and onboarding procedures. This step reduces the burden on HR staff and provides immediate support to new employees.
success_criteria: New hires receive prompt answers to their questions
Chatbot/virtual assistant is accurate and helpful

subprocess_flow.description: HR conducts an in-person onboarding session to welcome new hires, provide additional information, and answer any remaining questions. This session includes introductions to team members, a tour of the facilities, and a review of company culture and values. This step provides a personal touch and ensures that new hires feel welcomed and supported.
success_criteria: New hires attend in-person onboarding session
New hires feel welcomed and supported

subprocess_flow.description: HR gathers feedback from new hires about their onboarding experience and uses this feedback to improve the process. This may involve surveys, interviews, or focus groups. GenAI analyzes the feedback to identify trends and areas for improvement. This step ensures that the onboarding process remains effective and relevant.
success_criteria: Feedback is gathered from new hires
Feedback is analyzed to identify areas for improvement
